1. '''Open'''
  a. Confirm notepad can view several text formats
  a. Confirm all formats are displayed properly without artefacts or pixelization

2. '''New'''
  a. Confirm notepad can create several text formats
  a. Confirm font is configurable
  a. Confirm standard features are available for document creation

3. '''Reading'''
  a. Confirm scrolling, page down/up

4. '''Save'''
  a. Confirm any text and formating is still present after save and open
  a. Confirm that notepad can save as several different formats
